00032 namespace glm
00033 {
00034         // sec
00035         template <typename genType>
00036         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER genType sec
00037         (
00038                 genType const & angle
00039         )
00040         {
00041                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<genType>::is_iec559, "'sec' only accept floating-point values");
00042 
00043                 return genType(1) / glm::cos(angle);
00044         }
00045 
00046         VECTORIZE_VEC(sec)
00047 
00048         // csc
00049         template <typename genType>
00050         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER genType csc
00051         (
00052                 genType const & angle
00053         )
00054         {
00055                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<genType>::is_iec559, "'csc' only accept floating-point values");
00056 
00057                 return genType(1) / glm::sin(angle);
00058         }
00059 
00060         VECTORIZE_VEC(csc)
00061

00065         (
00066                 genType const & angle
00067         )
00068         {
00069                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<genType>::is_iec559, "'cot' only accept floating-point values");
00070 
00071                 return genType(1) / glm::tan(angle);
00072         }

00074         VECTORIZE_VEC(cot)

00078         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER genType asec
00079         (
00080                 genType const & x
00081         )
00082         {
00083                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<genType>::is_iec559, "'asec' only accept floating-point values");
00084         
00085                 return acos(genType(1) / x);

00095         )
00096         {
00097                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<genType>::is_iec559, "'acsc' only accept floating-point values");
00098 
00099                 return asin(genType(1) / x);
00100         }
00101 
00102         VECTORIZE_VEC(acsc)

00104         // acot
00105         template <typename genType>
00106         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER genType acot
00107         (
00108                 genType const & x
00109         )
00110         {
00111                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<genType>::is_iec559, "'acot' only accept floating-point values");
00112 
00113                 genType const pi_over_2 = genType(3.1415926535897932384626433832795 / 2.0);
00114                 return pi_over_2 - atan(x);
00115         }
00116 
00117         VECTORIZE_VEC(acot)
00118

00150         (
00151                 genType const & angle
00152         )
00153         {
00154                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<genType>::is_iec559, "'coth' only accept floating-point values");
00155

00157         }
